column1: Your doctor will give you pain medicines to take at home.
If your incision was closed with a dissolving suture, you may have had a liquid glue covering the incision.
- Your doctor will tell you when to start cleaning your wound daily with soap and water.
- Ask your doctor if you can take milk of magnesia or magnesium citrate.
- Ask your doctor if it is ok to eat foods that contain a lot of fiber or take psyllium (Metamucil).
